pages.text: $(bgreen)Bamboo Lord$() lives alone in a large mansion on the west side of Smoky Town, don't look at him facing vicious, but in fact he is a kind old man who likes children.$(br)$(byellow)Sun Cost$() : $(l)75$()$(br)$(bblue)Recharge$() : $(l)Normal$()$(br)$(l)Features$() : It is a $(l)close-kill$() plant, which will $(l)bring enemies to sky$() and then make a $(bred)explosion damage$() to all enemies in 3 blocks when enemy is close to it.

$(bpurple)Special : $()It will $(bred)split several fire crackers$() when exploded.$(br)$(bgreen)Plant Food :$() place many fire crackers around randomly which can take damage and bring enemies to sky.
